pages.text: This portal can only be lit in the Stratospherical Dimension, and will take the player to the End to begin the Second boss fight.$(br)This portal is made from "Stratospherical End Portal Frames"

pages.name: End Portal
pages.text: This portal frame must be lit using the $(item)"Laminated Crystal Tablet"
This portal can only be lit in the Stratospherical Dimension, and will take the player to the Stratospherical Nether$(br)This portal is made from "Stratospherical Nether Portal Frames"

pages.name: End Portal
pages.text: This portal frame must be lit using a $(item)"Bucket of Lava"
This portal can only be lit in the Exospherical Dimension, and will take the player back to the Stratospherical Dimension.$(br)This portal is made from "Stratospherical Portal Frames"

pages.name: Return Portal
pages.text: This portal frame must be lit using the $(item)"Orange Dragon Essence"
